;==============================================================================================================================
;---- River Ports  ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
;==============================================================================================================================
; increases growth and trade potential of the regions with rivers
; can be built practially in any conditions by all factions, cheaply but with long building times at higher levels
; the highest level is available only in 3 provinces of Flanders to depict the historical technological developments there
; in the future there should be special technological conditions added, related to the historical events

; Warning for moders:
; - if you remove "and event_counter dummy 1 or hidden_resource river" from any level, then the whole building chain becomes visible also in provinces where there's no river
; - if you'd like to introduce more complicated conditions then a script has to be written

;@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@    RIVER PORTS
building river_access
{
  convert_to river_access
  levels riverport2 riverport3 riverport4 riverport5
  {
    riverport2 requires factions { northern_european, middle_eastern, eastern_european, greek, southern_european, }  and event_counter dummy 1 or hidden_resource river
    {
      convert_to 0
      capability
      {
        population_growth_bonus bonus 1 requires not event_counter new_era_begins 1
        population_growth_bonus bonus 2 requires event_counter new_era_begins 1
		trade_base_income_bonus bonus 1 requires not event_counter new_era_begins 1
		trade_base_income_bonus bonus 2 requires event_counter new_era_begins 1
        law_bonus bonus -1
;---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
; UPKEEP/INCOME		
		income_bonus bonus 50
	  }

;==============================================================================================================================
;---- Money (city) ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
;==============================================================================================================================
; ECU
; MONEY_BARDI_BANK year 1280
; MONEY_KREMNICA_MINT year 1320
; POLAND4A_STATUTE_OF_KALISZ year 1370
; MONEY_MEDICI_FAMILY year 1400
; MONEY_FUGGER_FAMILY year 1420

; many changes can be done to this building line
; - Fugger - should probably be localised in Ulm - but the problem is Ulm is a castle (so cannot be built)
; - renovatio monetae event can play here
; - the settled merchant
; - presence of the hanse building (throug event_counter) - if eg 10 are built, increase of money from this building


;@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@    MONEY
building money_building
{
  levels money3 money4 money5 money6
  {
    money3 city requires factions { northern_european, southern_european, eastern_european, greek, middle_eastern, } and building_present_min_level market fairground and building_present_min_level city_hall council_chambers and hidden_resource capital and event_counter FL_is_crowned_ruler 1 or event_counter MONEY_BARDI_BANK 1 or event_counter faction_turn_islam 1 or event_counter faction_turn_byzantium 1
    {
      capability
      {
        trade_base_income_bonus bonus 2 requires not event_counter FL_policy_shady_connections 1 
        trade_base_income_bonus bonus 3 requires event_counter FL_policy_shady_connections 1 

        trade_base_income_bonus bonus 2 requires factions { poland, } and event_counter POLAND4A_STATUTE_OF_KALISZ 1
        trade_base_income_bonus bonus 2 requires factions { hungary, } and event_counter MONEY_KREMNICA_MINT 1
        trade_base_income_bonus bonus 2 requires factions { pisa, venice, sicily, hre, france, } and event_counter MONEY_BARDI_BANK 1

		income_bonus bonus 400 requires factions { france, } and event_counter MONEY_FIRST_ECU 1
		
        happiness_bonus bonus -1
        agent_limit merchant 1
		religion_level bonus -1

;==============================================================================================================================
;==============================================================================================================================
;---- Mines -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
;==============================================================================================================================
;==============================================================================================================================

; Mines are buildable only with metals, silver, gold. 
; Stone is mineable with Builders lvl3 and lvl4.
; Salt (coded: tobacco) is not minable with mines because:
;  1. historically mining was not so widespread until High MA, far more common were the salins on seashores,
;  2. the graphical view of a salt reasource with a shaft is not very nice, it's better to leave it without.

; Events pro memoria (turns): high_era 208, late_era 516, OSTSIEDLUNG 60-100 (depending on the player), GEORGIAN2_GOLDEN_AGE 80-140, EUPHROSYNE 150, ECONOMY_NEW_USES_OF_WATER_POWER (player builds 8 water mills), first_blast_furnace 400, IMPROVED_METALLURGY 532

		recruit_pool "Camel Gunners"  1   0.17   1   0  requires factions { moors, }  and event_counter pike_and_shot 1 and hidden_resource caravan

; Note that Berber Light Cavalry will be available from territories without berber hidden resource (it's not an error) - a historical justification is that the recruits will come from the Maghreb to Iberia themselves, and then get recruited.

;==================================================================================================================================
;==================================================================================================================================
;---- South Italy buildings -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
;==================================================================================================================================
;==================================================================================================================================
; the buildings can be built in 6 Sicilian provinces (Palermo, Reggio, Bari, Naples, Ancona, Rome) by certain factions
; while the Sicilian faction can build lvl2 and lvl4 everywhere
; lvl2 (Stronhold) is possible to build already at town level - it will in practice mark the Sicialian ownership
; for now there're 6 buildings in the chain so 3 are possible to be added - perhaps related to the Aragon rule?
; there should also be a review of the related events once they are developed
; the units for other factions are yet to be added

; the units provided by this building consist of immigrating Normans thus there're no miniumum religion requirements

; note that historically this unit was being phased out, and the value of the very building diminished as the time passed by - this is why the Norman Serjeants disappear after event Transitional Armour
		
; Further work on this building chain:
; - check the events when they're done (esp. hattin)
; - add availability of the Norman units also for the other factions, not only sicily 
; - check Norman evolution events (when they're done) and insert correct ones for the units

;@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@  SOUTH ITALY
building south_italy_building
{
  convert_to south_italy_building
  levels south_italy_building1_fundaments south_italy_building2_stronghold south_italy_building3_casteldelmonte south_italy_building4_castel south_italy_building5_palazzodeinormanii south_italy_building6_maschioangioino
  {
;==================================================================================================================================
;===================   South Italy Building 1 (Fundaments)   ======================================================================
;==================================================================================================================================
; bonus for the AI to prompt it building

    south_italy_building1_fundaments requires factions { sicily, } or factions { all, } and hidden_resource sicily and event_counter faction_turn_catholic 1 
    {
      convert_to 0
      capability
      {
        law_bonus bonus 2 requires event_counter ai_level_easy 1		; should induce the AI into building this building?
		law_bonus bonus 2 requires event_counter ai_level_medium 1	  
        law_bonus bonus 2 requires event_counter ai_level_hard 1
		law_bonus bonus 2 requires event_counter ai_level_veryhard 1	  
      } 
      material stone
      construction  6												; long time needed as establishment of political power takes time
      cost  3000
      settlement_min town
      upgrades
      {
	  south_italy_building2_stronghold
	  south_italy_building3_casteldelmonte
	  south_italy_building4_castel
	  south_italy_building5_palazzodeinormanii
	  south_italy_building6_maschioangioino
      }
    }
;==================================================================================================================================
;===================   South Italy Building 2 (Norman Stronghold)   ===============================================================
;==================================================================================================================================
; event_counter faction_turn_catholic added only to make it invisible in the preview of possible buildings for the other factions (not sure if it works, though)

    south_italy_building2_stronghold requires event_counter dummy 1 or not event_counter CONCENTRIC_CASTLES 1 and factions { sicily, } or factions { hre, england, france, jerusalem, papal_states, } and hidden_resource sicily and event_counter faction_turn_catholic 1 
    {
      convert_to 1
      capability
      {

		recruit_pool	"Norman Serjeants"				0.8		0.07	2  0  requires factions { all, } and not event_counter magna_carta 1
		recruit_pool	"Norman Serjeants"				0.8		0.04	2  0  requires factions { all, } and event_counter magna_carta 1 and not event_counter TRANSITIONAL_ARMOR 1

		recruit_pool	"Norman Cavalry"				0.6		0.03	2  0  requires factions { sicily, england, } and not event_counter battle_hattin 1
		recruit_pool	"Dismounted Norman Cavalry"		0.4		0.03	2  0  requires factions { sicily, england, } and not event_counter battle_hattin 1

		recruit_pool	"Norman Knights"				1.3		0.03	2  0  requires factions { sicily, } and event_counter battle_hattin 1 and not event_counter TRANSITIONAL_ARMOR 1		
		recruit_pool	"Dismounted Norman Knights"		1.1		0.03	2  0  requires factions { sicily, } and event_counter battle_hattin 1 and not event_counter TRANSITIONAL_ARMOR 1

		recruit_pool	"Chivalric Knights"				1.3		0.03	2  0  requires factions { sicily, } and event_counter TRANSITIONAL_ARMOR 1 		
		recruit_pool	"Dismounted Chivalric Knights"	1.1		0.03	2  0  requires factions { sicily, } and event_counter TRANSITIONAL_ARMOR 1 
			
        law_bonus bonus 1 requires not event_counter EDUCATION_PRIVILEGIUM_SCHOLASTICUM 1						; to be changed once evolution of the Sicilty faction is developed
        law_bonus bonus 2 requires event_counter EDUCATION_PRIVILEGIUM_SCHOLASTICUM 1
        population_growth_bonus bonus 1 requires event_counter lateran_council4 1		; to be changed once evolution of the Sicilty faction is developed
        trade_base_income_bonus bonus 1 requires not event_counter science_maths_zero_europe 1		; Liber Abaci
        trade_base_income_bonus bonus 2 requires event_counter science_maths_zero_europe 1
		
        law_bonus bonus 1 requires event_counter ai_level_easy 1
		law_bonus bonus 2 requires event_counter ai_level_medium 1
;---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
; UPKEEP/INCOME		
		income_bonus bonus -50
      }
      material stone
      construction  6
      cost  6000
      settlement_min town
      upgrades
      {
	  south_italy_building3_casteldelmonte	  
	  south_italy_building4_castel
	  south_italy_building5_palazzodeinormanii
	  south_italy_building6_maschioangioino	  
      }
    }

;==================================================================================================================================
;==================================================================================================================================
;---- Hansa Teutonica -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
;==================================================================================================================================
;==================================================================================================================================
;
; Available in low-level settlements (T1, then T2 and T3). It has two nodes:
; - all provinces with HR hanse can build baltic trade, then after certain events:
; -- German-inhabited (or settled) provinces (HR hre): Hansa of Merchants -> then after event Lubeck builds Holsteintor that enables another event allowing other cities Hansa of Cities
; -- provinces without German settlers: Faktorei -> four special cities after an event can build their unique Kontors
; Be very careful with changing HR - they play important part here (eg. only Lubeck should have both HR: poland and hre).
; Mind that there're provinces without access to the sea that will have this building.
; There's no limitation on the religion / faction basis - anybody can build (so you have to include also pic for each of 5 cultures).
; Hansa3 is available before hansa2 because it first the merchants developed and only then the trading posts started to provide significant income in the sending provinces.
;
; Events occur:
; HANSEATIC_LEAGUE - historically 1161, in-game ca. 1140-1160 (20-60 turns) - depending on how fast Szczecin and Lubeck are conquered.
; OSTSIEDLUNG - historically 1200, in-game ca. 1180-1200 (100-140 turns) - earlier date depends on the perfomance of the player.
; HANSEATIC_LEAGUE_EXPANDS - historically 1240, in-game 1190-1232 (120-200 turns)
; HANSEATIC_LUBECK - historically mid-13c, in-game 1232-1260 (200-260 turns)
; HANSEATIC_WARS - historically after 1284, in-game 1250-1290 (250-320 turns)
; HANSEATIC_COG - historically mid-13c, in-game   ca. 1280-1310 (300-350 turns)
; HANSEATIC_CONFEDERATION_OF_COLOGNE - historically 1356/60, in-game 1310-1360 (350-450 turns)
; PAVISE_SHIELDS 1320
; HANDGUN - ca. 1360 (not yet used here but should be in the future)

; Possible modifications in the future
; - benefits from trade for Holsteintor Hanse of Cities scale with the number of Faktoreien built
; - new events (Lords of the North - after Charles IV visit to Lubeck; Grosse Karavel - the Gdansk karaka waging war with England)


;@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@	HANSA TEUTONICA
building hansa_building
{
	convert_to hansa_building
	levels hansa1_baltic_trade hansa2_faktorei hansa3_of_merchants hansa4_of_cities hansa5_holsteintor hansa6_kontor_london hansa7_kontor_novgorod hansa8_kontor_bergen hansa9_kontor_brugge
    {
;==================================================================================================================================
;===================   Hansa 1 (Baltic Trade)   ===================================================================================
;==================================================================================================================================	   	
		hansa1_baltic_trade requires factions { northern_european, eastern_european, southern_european, greek, middle_eastern, } and event_counter HANSEATIC_LEAGUE 1 and hidden_resource hanse 
		{
            convert_to 0
			capability
            {
                trade_base_income_bonus bonus 1	requires not event_counter OSTSIEDLUNG 1
                trade_base_income_bonus bonus 2	requires event_counter OSTSIEDLUNG 1
				
				recruit_pool "Lettish Crossbowmen"  1   0.06   2  0  requires factions { all, } and event_counter OSTSIEDLUNG 1
			
;---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
; UPKEEP/INCOME		
			income_bonus bonus 50
            }
            material wooden
            construction  3 
            cost  3000 
            settlement_min town
            upgrades
            {
                hansa2_faktorei
                hansa3_of_merchants
				hansa4_of_cities						; after event HANSEATIC_COG there should be possibility to omit the Hansa of Merchants stage
            }
        }
;==================================================================================================================================
;===================   Hansa 2 (Faktorei)   =======================================================================================
;==================================================================================================================================		
        hansa2_faktorei requires factions { northern_european, eastern_european, southern_european, greek, middle_eastern, } and event_counter HANSEATIC_LEAGUE_EXPANDS 1 and hidden_resource hanse and hidden_resource england or hidden_resource norway or hidden_resource denmark or hidden_resource russia
        {
            convert_to 1
            capability
            {
                trade_base_income_bonus bonus 3	requires not event_counter HANSEATIC_COG 1
                trade_base_income_bonus bonus 4	requires event_counter HANSEATIC_COG 1
                population_growth_bonus bonus 1				
                law_bonus bonus -1
				happiness_bonus bonus -1 requires event_counter HANSEATIC_CONFEDERATION_OF_COLOGNE 1

				recruit_pool "Lettish Crossbowmen"  1   0.06   2  0  requires factions { all, } and not event_counter MOUNTED_CROSSBOWS 1
				recruit_pool "Lettish Crossbowmen"  1   0.07   2  1  requires factions { all, } and event_counter MOUNTED_CROSSBOWS 1 and not event_counter HANSEATIC_CONFEDERATION_OF_COLOGNE 1 
				recruit_pool "Lettish Crossbowmen"  1   0.09   3  1  requires factions { all, } and event_counter HANSEATIC_CONFEDERATION_OF_COLOGNE 1 

; must use 2 buildings here because there are provinces with "hansa" resource but without access to the sea
; this building provides only growth of the recruitment pool
; actually, this was hasn't been checked if it works - so pay attention in the future

				recruit_pool "cog"					0   0.1		0  0  requires factions { all, } and not event_counter HANSEATIC_WARS 1	
				recruit_pool "cog"					0   0.2		0  0  requires factions { all, } and event_counter HANSEATIC_WARS 1	
				recruit_pool "holk"  				0   0.1		0  0  requires factions { all, } and event_counter HANSEATIC_COG 1 and not event_counter HANSEATIC_CONFEDERATION_OF_COLOGNE 1
				recruit_pool "holk"  				0   0.2		0  0  requires factions { all, } and event_counter HANSEATIC_CONFEDERATION_OF_COLOGNE 1
				recruit_pool "carrack"				0   0.1		0  0  requires factions { northern_european, eastern_european, venice, pisa, sicily, papal_states, greek, } and event_counter world_is_round 1
				
;---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
; UPKEEP/INCOME		
			income_bonus bonus 100				
            }
            material stone
            construction  6
            cost  6000 
            settlement_min large_town
            upgrades
            {	
                hansa6_kontor_london
				hansa7_kontor_novgorod
				hansa8_kontor_bergen
				hansa9_kontor_brugge				
            }
        }
;==================================================================================================================================
;===================   Hansa 3 (Hansa of Merchants)   =============================================================================
;==================================================================================================================================		
        hansa3_of_merchants requires factions { northern_european, eastern_european, southern_european, greek, middle_eastern, } and event_counter OSTSIEDLUNG 1 and hidden_resource hanse and hidden_resource hre or hidden_resource poland or hidden_resource prussia
        {
            convert_to 2
            capability
            {
			
; H3 - CAPABILITIES			
                trade_base_income_bonus bonus 3	requires not event_counter HANSEATIC_COG 1
                trade_base_income_bonus bonus 4	requires event_counter HANSEATIC_COG 1
                population_growth_bonus bonus 1
				navy_bonus 1

				happiness_bonus bonus -1 requires factions { hre, } and not event_counter FL_policy_merchant_skills 1 and not event_counter FL_is_crowned_ruler 1	
				happiness_bonus bonus 1 requires factions { hre, } and event_counter FL_policy_merchant_skills 1 
				
				happiness_bonus bonus -2 requires factions { norway, denmark, england, scotland, france, jerusalem, } and not event_counter FL_policy_merchant_skills 1 and not event_counter FL_is_crowned_ruler 1	
				happiness_bonus bonus -1 requires factions { norway, denmark, england, scotland, france, jerusalem, } and event_counter FL_policy_merchant_skills 1 and not event_counter FL_is_crowned_ruler 1
				happiness_bonus bonus -1 requires factions { norway, denmark, england, scotland, france, jerusalem, } and not event_counter FL_policy_merchant_skills 1 and event_counter FL_is_crowned_ruler 1
				
				happiness_bonus bonus -2 requires factions { southern_european, eastern_european, greek, middle_eastern, } and not event_counter FL_policy_merchant_skills 1 and not event_counter FL_is_crowned_ruler 1
				happiness_bonus bonus -1 requires factions { southern_european, eastern_european, greek, middle_eastern, } and event_counter FL_policy_merchant_skills 1 and not event_counter FL_is_crowned_ruler 1
				happiness_bonus bonus -1 requires factions { southern_european, eastern_european, greek, middle_eastern, } and not event_counter FL_policy_merchant_skills 1 and event_counter FL_is_crowned_ruler 1

; H3 - AGENTS
				agent merchant  0
				agent_limit merchant 1

; H3 - UNITS	
				recruit_pool "Lettish Crossbowmen"  1   0.07   2  0  requires factions { all, } and not event_counter HANSEATIC_LEAGUE_EXPANDS 1 
				recruit_pool "Lettish Crossbowmen"  1   0.11   2  1  requires factions { all, } and event_counter HANSEATIC_LEAGUE_EXPANDS 1
				recruit_pool "Arbalesters"			1   0.07   1  0  requires factions { all, } and event_counter PAVISE_SHIELDS 1

; H3 - SHIPS
;    must use 2 buildings here because there are provinces with "hansa" resource but without access to the sea
;    this building provides only growth of the recruitment pool

				recruit_pool "cog"					0   0.15	0  0  requires factions { all, } and not event_counter HANSEATIC_WARS 1	
				recruit_pool "cog"					0   0.25	0  0  requires factions { all, } and event_counter HANSEATIC_WARS 1	
				recruit_pool "holk"  				0   0.15	0  0  requires factions { all, } and event_counter HANSEATIC_COG 1 and not event_counter HANSEATIC_CONFEDERATION_OF_COLOGNE 1
				recruit_pool "holk"  				0   0.25	0  0  requires factions { all, } and event_counter HANSEATIC_CONFEDERATION_OF_COLOGNE 1
				recruit_pool "carrack"				0   0.15	0  0  requires factions { northern_european, eastern_european, venice, pisa, sicily, papal_states, greek, } and event_counter world_is_round 1
				
;---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
; UPKEEP/INCOME		
			income_bonus bonus 100		
            }
            material stone
            construction  6
            cost  6000 
            settlement_min large_town
            upgrades
            {
				hansa4_of_cities
				hansa5_holsteintor				
            }
        }
;==================================================================================================================================
;===================   Hansa 4 (Hansa of Cities)   ================================================================================
;==================================================================================================================================				
        hansa4_of_cities requires factions { northern_european, eastern_european, southern_european, greek, middle_eastern, } and event_counter HANSEATIC_COG 1 and hidden_resource hanse and hidden_resource hre or hidden_resource poland or hidden_resource prussia
        {
            convert_to 3
            capability
            {

; H4 - CAPABILITIES			
                trade_base_income_bonus bonus 6	requires not event_counter world_is_round 1
                trade_base_income_bonus bonus 8	requires event_counter world_is_round 1
                population_growth_bonus bonus 2
				navy_bonus 2

				law_bonus bonus 1 requires not event_counter HANSEATIC_CONFEDERATION_OF_COLOGNE 1
				law_bonus bonus 3 requires event_counter HANSEATIC_CONFEDERATION_OF_COLOGNE 1
				
				happiness_bonus bonus -2 requires factions { hre, } and not event_counter FL_policy_merchant_skills 1 and not event_counter FL_is_crowned_ruler 1

;==================================================================================================================================
;==================================================================================================================================
;---- Rus Monastery  --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
;==================================================================================================================================
;==================================================================================================================================

; the buildings can be built in all provinces by the Rus factions, with the top levels only in certain (Novgorod, Pskov, Kiev)
; the other Orthodox factions can build these buildings in the Rus provinces
; the main goal of this building is to provide bonus to religion - when Orthodox religion is bordering with the Catholic and Pagan

; for now there're 6 buildings in the chain so 3 are possible to be added
; there should also be a review of the related events once they are developed

; Further work on this building chain:
; - check the events when they're done
; - check Rus evolution events and relate them somehow

;@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@  RUS MONASTERY
building rus_monastery
{
  convert_to rus_monastery
  levels rus_monastery_1enclosure rus_monastery_2skit rus_monastery_3lavra rus_monastery_4lavrasobor rus_monastery_5kiev rus_monastery_6novgorod rus_monastery_7pskov
  {
;==================================================================================================================================
;===================   Rus Monastery 1 (Monastic Enclosure)   =====================================================================
;==================================================================================================================================
    rus_monastery_1enclosure requires factions { kievan_rus, russia, } or factions { byzantium, georgia, serbia, } and hidden_resource kievan_rus or hidden_resource russia
    {
      convert_to 0	
      capability
      {
		happiness_bonus bonus 1 requires factions { russia, kievan_rus, byzantium, georgia, serbia, } and region_religion orthodox 50 
		law_bonus bonus 1 requires not event_counter is_the_player 1
;---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
; UPKEEP/INCOME	0
      } 
      material wooden
      construction  4
      cost  2000
      settlement_min town
      upgrades
      {
	  rus_monastery_2skit
      }
    }

		happiness_bonus bonus 2 requires factions { russia, kievan_rus, byzantium, georgia, serbia, } and region_religion orthodox 50

        religion_level bonus -1 requires factions { middle_eastern, } and not event_counter is_the_player 1

;==================================================================================================================================
;================================================================================================================================== CHUDE
;---- Chude -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
;==================================================================================================================================
; This building is preplaced in a number of provinces of North-Eastern Europe at the beginning of the game (1132).
; Upgrade or rebuilding is possible in 12 provinces.
; It provides trade, happiness for pagan religion, and a AoR unit "Chude Militia", but decreases influence of all non-pagan religions.
; As the game progresses, the hinterland_farms will be build in the north of Europe and to progress with higher levels of farms, the Chude building will have to be dismantled. The player must do it himself, for the AI there's a script disbanding it every 25 years, starting after turn 200.
; The higher farm levels will also prevent from re-building Chude later on.
; Neither upkeep costs, nor direct income is assotiatied with this building.

;@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@
building chude_building
{
  convert_to chude_building
  levels chude0_camp chude1_village chude2_town
  {
    chude0_camp requires factions { northern_european, eastern_european, southern_european, greek, middle_eastern, } and not building_present_min_level hinterland_farms farms4 and hidden_resource russia or hidden_resource cumans and hidden_resource unique1 or hidden_resource kievan_rus and hidden_resource unique1 or hidden_resource kievan_rus and hidden_resource unique2 or hidden_resource lithuania and hidden_resource unique1 or hidden_resource lithuania and hidden_resource unique2
    {
	  convert_to 0
      capability
      {
		trade_base_income_bonus bonus 2
        religion_level bonus -1 requires factions { northern_european, hungary, poland, kievan_rus, russia, middle_eastern, greek, southern_european, }
		
        recruit_pool  "Chude Militia"		1   0.13	2	4	requires factions { all, } and not event_counter high_era 1
        recruit_pool  "Chude Militia"		1   0.13	2	3	requires factions { all, } and event_counter high_era 1 and not event_counter late_era 1
        recruit_pool  "Chude Militia"		1   0.13	2	0	requires factions { all, } and event_counter late_era 1

		happiness_bonus bonus 3 requires region_religion pagan 70
		happiness_bonus bonus 2 requires region_religion pagan 40 and not region_religion pagan 70
		happiness_bonus bonus 1 requires region_religion pagan 10 and not region_religion pagan 40			
      }
      material wooden
      construction  10
      cost  1000
      settlement_min village
      upgrades
      {
        chude1_village
      }
    }
    chude1_village requires factions { northern_european, eastern_european, southern_european, greek, middle_eastern, } and not building_present_min_level hinterland_farms farms2 and hidden_resource russia or hidden_resource cumans and hidden_resource unique1 or hidden_resource kievan_rus and hidden_resource unique1 or hidden_resource kievan_rus and hidden_resource unique2 or hidden_resource lithuania and hidden_resource unique1 or hidden_resource lithuania and hidden_resource unique2
    {
      convert_to 1
	  capability
      {
		trade_base_income_bonus bonus 4
        religion_level bonus -2 requires factions { northern_european, hungary, poland, kievan_rus, russia, middle_eastern, greek, southern_european, }

        recruit_pool  "Chude Militia"		1   0.17	2	4	requires factions { all, } and not event_counter high_era 1
        recruit_pool  "Chude Militia"		1   0.17	2	3	requires factions { all, } and event_counter high_era 1 and not event_counter late_era 1
        recruit_pool  "Chude Militia"		1   0.17	2	0	requires factions { all, } and event_counter late_era 1

		happiness_bonus bonus 4 requires region_religion pagan 70
		happiness_bonus bonus 3 requires region_religion pagan 50 and not region_religion pagan 70
		happiness_bonus bonus 2 requires region_religion pagan 30 and not region_religion pagan 50
		happiness_bonus bonus 1 requires region_religion pagan 10 and not region_religion pagan 30		
      }
      material wooden
      construction  15
      cost  2000
      settlement_min town
      upgrades
      {
        chude2_town
      }

    {

		trade_base_income_bonus bonus 6
        religion_level bonus -3 requires factions { northern_european, hungary, poland, kievan_rus, russia, middle_eastern, greek, southern_european, }

; mind that a few wonders / unique buildings are also included in the other building lines:
; - The Aqueduct of Valens - in the building line "water"
; - Bait Al-Hikhma - in the building line "education"
; - Al-Azhar Mosque - in the building line "education"
; - many upper levels of regional building lines (Hansa, Rus Monastery, Alcazar)

; Most of wonders are religious-related: only factions from a certain religion should be able to build them.
; This is best coded with "requires factions { LIST OF ELIGIBIGLE FACTIONS, }" - to prevent display in the building browser for the factions that cannot built it (unfortunately, a failed (negative) "event_counter" does not prevent visibility).


;============================================================================================================================== Hagia Sophia
;---- Constantinople - Hagia Sophia -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
;==============================================================================================================================
; historically all three religions used it as a temple at some point, but for the Greeks it was the cornerstone of the system
; for the moment it's not possible to convert it into a mosque but a script for it should be developed (along the Cordoba mosque)
; Constantinople has also other unique buildings - as top levels of the regular buildings: The Aqueduct of Valens, ...

;@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@
building wonders2
{
  levels wonder_hagia_sophia
  {
    wonder_hagia_sophia city requires factions { northern_european, southern_european, greek, poland, hungary, russia, kievan_rus, } and region_religion orthodox 50 and event_counter faction_turn_orthodox 1 and building_present_min_level builders builders4 and hidden_resource Constantinople
    {
      capability
      {
        law_bonus bonus 5 requires factions { greek, kievan_rus, russia, }
        law_bonus bonus 3 requires factions { northern_european, southern_european, hungary, poland, cumans, lithuania, middle_eastern, }
		
		population_health_bonus bonus 10
		
        religion_level bonus 3 requires factions { greek, kievan_rus, russia, }
        religion_level bonus -3 requires factions { northern_european, southern_european, hungary, poland, }
        religion_level bonus -5 requires factions { middle_eastern, cumans, lithuania, }
		
; diplomat for all factions - as diplomats would serve also rulers from the other faiths
        agent diplomat 0
        agent_limit diplomat 1
		
        law_bonus bonus 2 requires event_counter ai_level_hard 1
		law_bonus bonus 4 requires event_counter ai_level_veryhard 1
	  }
      faction_capability
      {
      happiness_bonus bonus 1 requires factions { greek, kievan_rus, russia, }
      }		
      material stone
      construction  16
      cost  16000
      settlement_min large_city
      upgrades
      {
      }
    }
  }
  plugins
  {
  }
}

;============================================================================================================================== Holy Sepulchre
;---- Jerusalem - Holy Sepulchre ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
;==============================================================================================================================
; the church (lvl2)  is already built in Jerusalem at the beginning of the game (1132)
; but it may get destroyed either in the fights (when the city is conqered), or demolished (by the player, because the AI doesn't demolish the buildings),
;   or it may burn through the "Great Fire" script. To enable the Great Fire end two additional levels are added:
; - level "burnt" -  it is not buildable but only received through script. To prevent the player from income from dismantling it, buid the price is low.
; - level chapel is added so that the first buildable level is not "burnt" one, and the normal upgrade will go directly to Church.

;@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@

{
  levels holy_sepulchre_1_chapel holy_sepulchre_2_burnt holy_sepulchre_3_church
  {
    holy_sepulchre_1_chapel city requires factions { northern_european, southern_european, greek, poland, hungary, russia, kievan_rus, } and building_present_min_level builders builders2 and hidden_resource jerusalem and hidden_resource capital and event_counter faction_turn_catholic 1 or event_counter faction_turn_orthodox 1 
    {
      capability
      {
        happiness_bonus bonus 1 requires factions { northern_european, southern_european, eastern_european, greek, }
        religion_level bonus 1 requires factions { northern_european, southern_european, eastern_european, greek, }
		
        income_bonus bonus 2000 requires factions { jerusalem, } and not event_counter battle_hattin 1		; stop gap solution for the income of KoJ
		income_bonus bonus 200		
		
        recruit_pool "Canons of the Holy Sepulcher"  1   0.04 2  0  requires factions { jerusalem, } and not event_counter lateran_council3 1
        recruit_pool "Canons of the Holy Sepulcher"  1   0.07 2  0  requires factions { jerusalem, } and event_counter lateran_council3 1 and not event_counter lateran_council4 1	
        recruit_pool "Canons of the Holy Sepulcher"  1   0.11 3  0  requires factions { jerusalem, } and event_counter lateran_council4 1	
		
        law_bonus bonus 2 requires event_counter ai_level_hard 1
		law_bonus bonus 4 requires event_counter ai_level_veryhard 1
	  }
      material stone
      construction  6
      cost  6000
      settlement_min large_town
      upgrades
      {
		holy_sepulchre_2_burnt
		holy_sepulchre_3_church		
      }
    }
    holy_sepulchre_2_burnt city requires factions { northern_european, southern_european, greek, poland, hungary, russia, kievan_rus, } and building_present_min_level builders builders2 and hidden_resource jerusalem and event_counter dummy 1
    {
      capability
      {
        religion_level bonus 1 requires factions { northern_european, southern_european, eastern_european, greek, }
		
        recruit_pool "Canons of the Holy Sepulcher"  1   0.04 2  0  requires factions { jerusalem, } and not event_counter lateran_council3 1
        recruit_pool "Canons of the Holy Sepulcher"  1   0.07 2  0  requires factions { jerusalem, } and event_counter lateran_council3 1 and not event_counter lateran_council4 1	
        recruit_pool "Canons of the Holy Sepulcher"  1   0.11 3  0  requires factions { jerusalem, } and event_counter lateran_council4 1	
		
        law_bonus bonus 2 requires event_counter ai_level_hard 1
		law_bonus bonus 4 requires event_counter ai_level_veryhard 1
	  }
      material stone
      construction 1
      cost  1
      settlement_min large_town
      upgrades
      {
		holy_sepulchre_3_church		  
      }
    }
	holy_sepulchre_3_church city requires factions { northern_european, southern_european, greek, poland, hungary, russia, kievan_rus, } and building_present_min_level builders builders2 and hidden_resource jerusalem and hidden_resource capital and event_counter faction_turn_catholic 1 or event_counter faction_turn_orthodox 1
